ygData.subject: Re: Membership restrictions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I did not form this list, I am just on it so I am not certain of its mandate.  I do not mind men who believe in supporting women in their rights to pursue
ygData.messageBody:
I did not form this list, I am just on it so I am not certain of its mandate. I
do not mind men who believe in supporting women in their rights to pursue
sisterhood, whether it be on Terran or Norrathian soil. I do mind men who have
to argue every single point ever made and who get insulted when women do a little
harmless male bashing *smile*. If you are the former, I would welcome you here.
If the latter, I get enough of that in RL, I don't need it when I escape.

Dnaice on Quellious
Trisango on Brell Serilis

Mystyrain8@... wrote:

> From: Mystyrain8@...
>
> Ack! We've been invaded! <giggles> Seriously though, I don't mind as long
> as the rest dont mind. You could have been very dishonest and not told us
> that you weren't female. The fact that you didn't wins major brownie points
> on my end! <beams>
>
> In Light,
>
> Mystyrain
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to online communities.
